As the new Symbol Of Victory, Katuski had an extremely busy life, but one he was extremely thankful for. He had everything he could ask for though, something still felt like it was missing.
 
The time was 5:32, and he knew if he fell asleep now he’d wake up at 2am and wouldn’t be able to get back to sleep. He needed to stay awake just a few hours longer to try and have some semblance of a sleep schedule.
 
The blonde made his way into his kitchen and started cooking up dinner, hoping food might wake him up some. While cooking he opened his phone and began looking for something to watch and keep his exhausted brain stimulated.
 
Katsuki was never one for streamers but he had hoped having something live might keep his brain more awake. Looking through Twitch however, nothing seemed interesting. That was until he saw it. Or rather him.
 
The thumbnail showed a boy with wild viridian hair and matching bright eyes. He couldn’t see much of him from just the thumbnail alone but the guy sure had a hell of a look. Katsuki wondered if his hair color was naturally green or if he dyed it like Kirishima. But the thing that REALLY caught his attention was the title.
 
PRO HERO DYNAMIGHT: VILLAIN FIGHT BREAKDOWN AND ANALYSIS!
 
This dude was really doing a breakdown of his last battle on twitch? Really? Now this he HAD to see. 
 
Clicking the stream his jaw hung he couldn’t believe what he was seeing. This fucker. Not only did he have that beautiful ocean green hair, but he has gorgeous long dark eyelashes, soft full pink lips, and freckles. Holy shit. The freckles! A beautiful plethora of constellations across his cheeks and down his neck. And wait, where are they on his arms too?! Each time the guy waved his arms around Katsuki could see some along his forearm, beautiful soft angel kisses all over. God fucking damnit.
 
The best way Katsuki could describe him was like a fae from some fantasy story he might have read as a kid. He looked ethereal and beautiful. Katsuki felt like he knew this guy from somewhere but also didn’t, it made his heart beat faster and his stomach do flips just looking at the guy. Like some weird connection he couldn't even explain.
 
He was so distracted by how gorgeous the man was he didn’t even register he was talking.
 
“As you can see here, during his fight DynaMight was attempting to try out some new types of explosions. His quirk is made from the sweat on his hands so I theorize that he’s been trying out new techniques since it’s winter and he can’t get as much sweat as he’d need for his other explosions he’d have during summer.” The freckled beauty remarks.
 
Katsuki’s brain nearly short circuits. His voice was so soft and airy. Like a warm cup of cocoa after playing out in the snow. It was like if warm hugs had a sound. The blonde couldn’t believe his ears, there’s no way someone could look so adorable and have the sweetest voice as well. This was some absolute bullshit! He HAD to have some kinda flaw!
 
Katsuki stared intensely at his phone as he listened to the greenette talk about his last battle, now even MORE impressed by how intelligent the guy was. He talked wildly with his arms, going off on long tirades about quirks and how they were used, every now and then giving praise to how amazing DynaMight was during his last battle.
 
Katsuki had nearly forgotten about his food as he had gotten so sucked into the nerds' ramblings. Grabbing a bowl and scooping up some of the curry he had just made he wandered into his room and turned on his PC to sit and watch the stream from the comfort of his desk.
 
As he loaded up the URL, he watched the chat from his phone. The guy was clearly pretty popular, and gathered quite a few “simps”, as Mina would call them. The chat was going a mile a minute, he’s honestly impressed the greenette could keep up. 
 
Each time there was a donation he would pause his ramblings to thank them then go back to rambling or answering questions in chat.
